name: 10 Seconds Knight
description:
You are The Knight who wields the powerful sword, a sword so powerful that you can use it only... once per 10 seconds?

Hi! I'm FL1PPY and I introduce you my game made to Bullet Hell Game Jam!

10 Seconds Knight is a bullet hell game where the player can attack only once per 10 seconds. Until then the player must avoid “bullets”.

Every Asset or Script (except Music) has been made for this game. 

Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise

I hope you've enojyed my game!

I'm trying my best to build it to WebGL but I have some problems with it. Sorry!
